entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy is mentioned as part of the team, but no specific actions or characteristics are described.

entities.name: padfoot
entities.description: Padfoot is mentioned alongside Percy, but no specific actions or characteristics are described.

entities.name: johnson
entities.description: Johnson's hairstyle is mocked by Pansy Parkinson.

entities.name: angelina
entities.description: Angelina gives instructions to the team and throws the Quaffle to Fred.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry passes the Quaffle to Ron and is mentioned as reversing away from the others.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron drops the Quaffle and falls back toward the opposite goal.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred receives the Quaffle from Angelina and passes it to George.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George receives the Quaffle from Fred and passes it to Harry.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy leads the Slytherins in laughing at Ron's mishap.

relationships.description: Angelina throws the Quaffle to Fred.
Fred passes the Quaffle to George.
George passes the Quaffle to Harry.
Harry passes the Quaffle to Ron.
Ron drops the Quaffle, which was thrown by Angelina.
